name: redux-immutable-state-invariant
description: Redux middleware that detects mutations between and outside redux dispatches. For development use only.

scripts.test:coverage: rm -rf coverage/ && istanbul cover --report lcov _mocha -- --compilers js:babel-core/register test/*.spec.js --recursive
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.example: cd example && rm -rf node_modules/redux-immutable-state-invariant && yarn install && yarn start

author: Leonardo Andres Garcia Crespo <leoasis@gmail.com>
